name: Doppler-3
description:
Move - “W, A, S, D”;

Aim - Hold right click

Shoot - Left click when right click is held

UI IS NOT DONE CURRENTLY. You have 30 ammo, and each deals 2 damage. The enemy has 10 HP. Ammo limitation is not shown on screen.
